name: Mindblocked
description:
Mindblocked is a simple puzzle game - reach point B from point A. But every time you move, the empty space gets filled with blocks! As you run out of space to move freely, can you use this to your advantage?

Controls: Arrows/WASD + Space/Enter

Game details and instructions explained in-game.

Art/design/code done in 72 hours by Diptoman Mukherjee and Pranjal Bisht for Ludum Dare 42.
Audio from ozzed.net + some by Joel Montpetit.

NOTE: Saving isn't working for the HTML5 version here for some reason - so if you leave the game during a session, all data will be lost.
